body: //figure[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' article-span-photo ')] | //section[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' article-body ')]

strip_id_or_class: article-body-aside
strip_id_or_class: big_ad

prune: no

test_url: https://cn.nytimes.com/asia-pacific/20221108/taiwan-bomb-shelters-keelung/
